MQTT_QOS (ENUM)
MQTT_QOS (ENUM)
Â¶
TYPE MQTT_QOS :
Attributes:
qualified_only
InOut:
Name
Initial
Comment
QoS0
0
Send Message 1x, if disconnect from server then send can
fail.
QoS1
1
Send Message Nx, until Receive is acknowledged.
QoS2
2
Send Message 1x, if disconnect from server then send is
always successfully.
